editorialNotes.standard: Behind this app’s slick drawing and painting tools are robust features that you’d normally expect from a fully fledged illustration package–it can even use your Apple Watch as a colour picker.
editorialNotes.short: Intuitive and smart painting and sketching tools.

ios.subtitle: Create pixel art from an image

editorialNotes.standard: This 2020 Apple Design Award winner is accessible enough for anyone to use. Start drawing with just a single touch, capturing your first frame. Draw again, capture, and hit play–you’ve created your first animation!

Coloring. It’s fun, creative, and just for little kids. Right? Wrong. Once you get your hands on this virtual coloring book—designed for adults—you’ll wise up to this one simple fact: we never should have quit. Each illustration is wonderful designed, and we loved switching between watercolors, colored pencils, and pens to make every piece unique.
editorialNotes.short: Add texture and depth with the watercolour tool.

ios.subtitle: Paint it.  Blend it.  Love it.

editorialNotes.short: Create beautiful artwork any time inspiration strikes.

name: You Doodle Pro - art on the go

editorialNotes.short: Pick colours from any source and drag-and-drop to and from other apps.

editorialNotes.tagline: New ways to sketch and animate
editorialNotes.standard: With stunning filters and thousands of importable brushes, this app lets you generate high-calibre artwork at a blistering pace. It supports pressure sensitivity and Apple Pencil–as well as iCloud Drive–so sharing your work is incredibly simple.
editorialNotes.short: This super-intuitive app makes it simple to paint your next masterpiece.
